NK037(ji)003:1: / legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs dbang chog dang bcas pa bzhugs so //
NK037(ji)003:3: he ru ka dpal che ba'i mchog /
NK037(ji)003:5: legs ldan mgon la gus btud nas //
NK037(ji)003:6: de sgrub snying po dril te bshad //
NK037(ji)003:7: 'dir legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs dang
NK037(ji)003:8: 'brel bar rjes su gnang ba sgrub pa la gsum
NK037(ji)003:9: ste / sbyor ba yo byad kyi shoms /
NK037(ji)003:10: dngos gzhi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK037(ji)003:12: dang po yo byad bsham pa ni /
NK037(ji)003:13: nyer dgu la sogs pa'i dus khyad par can la /
NK037(ji)003:14: man+dala sgom don dang mthun par bris pa'am /
NK037(ji)003:15: bsdu na phyi rdo ra me ris zlum por bskor ba'i dbus su gru gsum mthing nag /
NK037(ji)003:16: zla gam la dur khrod kyi bkod pa /
NK037(ji)003:17: lte bar lha'i bzhugs tshul dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan nam me tog gi tshom bu bkod /
NK037(ji)003:18: der many+dzi la bum pa chas ldan bcud kyis gtams pa dang /
NK037(ji)003:19: de'i mdun du gtor ma tsaka li dang mda' dar gyis brgyan pa bkod de /
NK037(ji)003:20: dbyibs lcags mkhar zlum po kha bad can gyi tshul
NK037(ji)003:21: du byas pa'i khar gtso bo'i bshos su gru gsum
NK037(ji)003:23: mdun du yum gyi bshos bu gru gsum pa /
NK037(ji)003:24: rmang gi phyogs bzhir bka' sdod bzhi la shar dang lhor gru gsum pa re /
NK037(ji)003:25: nub tu gru gsum g.yas gcus /
NK037(ji)003:26: byang du gru gsum pa rnams bshos phran dang mtheb rkus bskor ba bya /
NK037(ji)003:31: gzhan yang 'og tu dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:33: bdag bskyed khro bo'i rgyal po gang rung zhig bsgoms
NK037(ji)003:34: nas mchod pa spyi dang sman gtor rak+ta rnams byin
NK037(ji)003:35: gyis brlab / mdun bskyed kyi rten bsang sbyang /
NK037(ji)003:36: stong pa'i ngang las mdun gyi nam mkhar khrag zhag 'khrugs pa'i klong /
NK037(ji)003:37: ma la ya gnam lcags 'bar ba'i do /
NK037(ji)003:38: rab tu 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba'i gnas su dur
NK037(ji)003:39: khrod rol pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po'i lte bar
NK037(ji)003:40: pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du mi ro dang rta
NK037(ji)003:41: ro la gnas pa'i h+aum las gri gug h+aum gis
NK037(ji)003:42: mtshan pa yongs su gyur pa las /
NK037(ji)003:43: dpal ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po
NK037(ji)003:44: chen po rdo rje srin po'i gzugs can sku mdog
NK037(ji)003:45: mthing nag thung zhing sbom la yan lag rags pa
NK037(ji)003:46: nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can /
NK037(ji)003:47: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa /
NK037(ji)003:48: zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i gra nas khrag 'dzag pa /
NK037(ji)003:49: ljags 'dril zhing drag po'i rkan sgra rdeb pa /
NK037(ji)003:50: khro gnyer bsdus pa'i shangs nas 'thor byed kyi rlung sgra 'byin pa /
NK037(ji)003:51: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum sdang mig tu ldog pa /
NK037(ji)003:52: dbu skra dang sma ra smin ma kham nag gyen
NK037(ji)003:53: du 'bar ba las skar chen gyi 'od 'phro ba
NK037(ji)003:54: / phyag g.yas 'bar ba'i gri gug dang g.yon gdug
NK037(ji)003:55: pa can gyi khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa thugs
NK037(ji)003:57: mchan g.yas su tsan+dana gyi bing chen gzer ba'i bing stod nas lha dmag 'bum dang /
NK037(ji)003:58: bing smad nas bdud dmag nyi khri chig stong 'gyed pa /
NK037(ji)003:59: sku la dar nag gi 'jol ber brtsegs mar gsol zhing /
NK037(ji)003:60: gser sked nor bu'i mig tshangs can bcings pa /
NK037(ji)003:61: thod pa skam pa rigs lnga'i rtse phran can gyi dbu rgyan dang /
NK037(ji)003:62: rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu dang rdo rje'i do shal 'phyang ba /
NK037(ji)003:63: yan lag sbrul gyis dkris shing mi lpags kyi stod g.yogs sogs dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas can /
NK037(ji)003:64: sag t+wi'i lhwam yu ring gsol nas g.yon brkyang pa'i
NK037(ji)003:65: stabs kyis bgying zhing brjid pas dgra bgegs rnams bardzisa
NK037(ji)003:66: pa / gtum zhing mi bsrun pa'i nyams can //
NK037(ji)003:67: spyi bor bya khyung nag po 'phur zhing lding ba /
NK037(ji)003:68: sta zur gnyis na seng ge ral pa sprug pa /
NK037(ji)003:71: ye shes kyi me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na khams
NK037(ji)003:72: gsum dbang du sdud cing srid gsum zil gyis gnon
NK037(ji)003:73: pa'i bdag nyid can du bzhugs pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:74: de'i g.yon du nyi ma ro'i gdan la yum kro
NK037(ji)003:75: d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma sku mdog sngon mo zhal gcig
NK037(ji)003:77: ral pa mthur du gtibs pa'i gseb nas me stag 'phro ba /
NK037(ji)003:78: zhing gi pags pas stod g.yogs shing nyi zla gza' skar dang 'ja' 'od 'khrug pa /
NK037(ji)003:79: stag lpags dang re lde'i smad dkris can /
NK037(ji)003:80: sbrul nag gi 'phyang 'phrul dang chu srin gyi thod pas brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)003:81: g.yas sbrul zhags dang g.yon thod skyogs rus bcud rkang
NK037(ji)003:82: klad dang 'bru mar khrag chang gis gang ba rol
NK037(ji)003:83: zhing stob pa / g.yas su las kyi mgon po
NK037(ji)003:84: mdog nag cing mi sdug pa'i gzugs can skra kham
NK037(ji)003:85: pa gyen du bardzesa pa g.yas gri gug dang g.yon
NK037(ji)003:87: g.yon brkyang gis ro'i gdan la bka' nod pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:88: de dag gi shar du h'u las khro chen badz+ra
NK037(ji)003:89: king ka ra sku mdog mthing nag rngams shing khros
NK037(ji)003:90: pa'i nyams can zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas mtshon
NK037(ji)003:91: cha'i 'khor lo bskor zhing dmigs pa'i mgo lus 'dral
NK037(ji)003:92: ba / g.yon thod pa dgra bo'i snying khrag gis gang ba zhal du gsol ba /
NK037(ji)003:93: mi lpags kyi stod g.yogs dang stag lpags kyi smad dkris can sbrul dang thod pas brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)003:94: gri thogs king chen bcu gnyis sogs las byed dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)003:95: lhor ya las gnod sbyin zangs mdog dmar nag kha gdangs shing rkan sgra rdeb pa /
NK037(ji)003:96: sdang mig gis dgra dpung sreg cing ral pa dmar po sprin ltar gtibs pa /
NK037(ji)003:97: g.yas gser gyi spu gri 'phyar zhing g.yon bse mdung 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)003:98: yum bse gdong zangs mgrin can dmar nag 'ja' tshon
NK037(ji)003:99: gyi gos can byad thag dang nad rkyal thogs pa
NK037(ji)003:102: mi dmar bshan pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sogs las byed dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)003:103: nub tu dza las gza' bdud chen po r+aa hu
NK037(ji)003:104: la sku mdog dud kha srin po'i gzugs can mgo
NK037(ji)003:105: bo dgu pa lus kun mig gis gang zhing gtum
NK037(ji)003:106: rngams 'khrugs pa'i nyams can g.yas gri gug 'phyar ba'i
NK037(ji)003:107: rtse las skyin thang gi 'khor lo bskor zhing /
NK037(ji)003:108: g.yon thod khrag rngub cing chu srin gyi zhags pa 'phen pa /
NK037(ji)003:109: sku smad sbrul du 'khril zhing zhing gi g.yang gzhi dang /
NK037(ji)003:110: thod sbrul gyi phreng ba sogs 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)003:113: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs srid gsum dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)003:114: byang du ma las 'dod khams bdag mo re ma
NK037(ji)003:115: t+ai nag mo skem zhing rid la gtum pa'i nyams
NK037(ji)003:116: can zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i bar du
NK037(ji)003:117: mi ro rengs po gsol ba /
NK037(ji)003:118: drag po'i rkan sgra rdeb cing shangs nas nad kyi na bun thul ba /
NK037(ji)003:119: lteb nas nyi ma 'char zhing spyi bor zla ba tshes pa /
NK037(ji)003:120: thod skam gyi dbu rgyan dang thod rlon gyi do shal can /
NK037(ji)003:121: snyan g.yas seng ge dang g.yon pa sbrul dang dril bus brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)003:122: g.yas khram shing 'phyar zhing g.yon nad rkyal dgral la 'gyed pa /
NK037(ji)003:123: mi lpags kyi stod g.yogs dang re lde'i smad dkris
NK037(ji)003:124: sbrul gyi ske rags can drel rta rkang gsum srin
NK037(ji)003:125: po'i thod pa'i sga dang sbrul gyi gong smed can
NK037(ji)003:126: la chibs nas rak+ta'i rgya mtshor rol pa /
NK037(ji)003:127: nad kyi rkyal pa tshon gyi gru gu sho rdel
NK037(ji)003:128: dkar nag bdud kyi khram shing ste sprul pa'i mtshon
NK037(ji)003:129: cha lnga 'chang ba nag mo 'bum sde'i 'khor dang
NK037(ji)003:130: bcas te rlung nag 'tshubs ma'i dbus na bzhugs pa
NK037(ji)003:131: / de dag gi phyi rol du sprul pa dang
NK037(ji)003:132: yang sprul pho nya las byed sde brgyad dregs pa'i
NK037(ji)003:133: dmag tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor ba thams
NK037(ji)003:134: cad kyang phrin las 'dod rgur sgyur zhing sgrub pa'i
NK037(ji)003:135: po'i re ba skong bas nam mkha' bar snang sa
NK037(ji)003:136: gzhi thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur /
NK037(ji)003:137: gtso 'khor thams cad kyi dpral bar dkar po /
NK037(ji)003:140: h'u las 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu 'phros pas /
NK037(ji)003:141: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog 'og min
NK037(ji)003:142: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ma la ya gnam
NK037(ji)003:143: lcags 'bar ba'i ri bo dur khrod chen po brgyad
NK037(ji)003:144: sogs rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dpal mgon legs ldan
NK037(ji)003:145: tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa mdun gyi
NK037(ji)003:146: nam mkhar sprin phung gtibs pa bzhi byon par bsam
NK037(ji)003:147: la lcags kyu'i rgya bcings te /
NK037(ji)003:148: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)003:149: b+hu rkur ma h+aa k+aa la sa ma ya hrim hrim ang+ku sha dza dzah zhes dang /
NK037(ji)003:151: lang+ka yul gyi grong brdal gyi //
NK037(ji)003:152: dbus kyi ri bo ma la ya //
NK037(ji)003:153: ko ka thang dmar rgya mtsho'i do //
NK037(ji)003:154: drag shul yod pa'i rtse mo na //
NK037(ji)003:155: dpal chen rdo rje srin po yis //
NK037(ji)003:156: bdud kyi sde rnams btul nas kyang //
NK037(ji)003:157: gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe //
NK037(ji)003:158: ming gi dbang bskur bran du khas blangs pa //
NK037(ji)003:159: rdo rje ro langs dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag /
NK037(ji)003:160: mgon po nag po chen po dang //
NK037(ji)003:161: nye gnas kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma //
NK037(ji)003:162: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i 'khor //
NK037(ji)003:163: lang+ka'i bdag po la sogs dang //
NK037(ji)003:164: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)003:166: pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK037(ji)003:167: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)003:169: e h+ye hi sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la ga na
NK037(ji)003:170: pa ti sa pa ri w+aa ra ma h+aa ka
NK037(ji)003:171: ru ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam
NK037(ji)003:172: / +aa kar+sha ya h+aum dzah e a ral+li hrim hrim dzahdzah zhes pas spyan drangs la /
NK037(ji)003:174: rdo rje brag chen gtams pa dang //
NK037(ji)003:175: nyi zla pad+ma rin chen khri //
NK037(ji)003:176: bam chen bsnol ba'i gdan steng du //
NK037(ji)003:177: rab 'jigs dpa' bo 'khor bcas bzhugs gsol //
NK037(ji)003:178: b+hurkura ma h+aa ka la rak+mo kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai
NK037(ji)003:179: nag mo ting lam sa ma ya s+t+wam tish+tha badz+ra
NK037(ji)003:181: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)003:182: badz+ra sa ma ya ha na ha na h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)003:183: dpal rdo rje nag po chen po legs ldan tshogs
NK037(ji)003:184: kyi bdag po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
NK037(ji)003:185: kyis rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma
NK037(ji)003:186: dam pa rnams kyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da'
NK037(ji)003:187: bar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srungs sogs kyis dam
NK037(ji)003:188: tshig gnyer gtad / lha yi sde dpon tshogs kyi bdag /
NK037(ji)003:189: legs ldan nag po mthu bo che //
NK037(ji)003:190: dur khrod bdag po sgrol ba'i ging //
NK037(ji)003:192: a ti p+au hoh pra t+aits+tsha hoh zhes pas phyag bya /
NK037(ji)003:194: stong gsum 'di 'am stong gsum gzhan dag na //
NK037(ji)003:195: me tog phreng ba la sogs rin chen dbyig /
NK037(ji)003:196: la du la phug la sogs yid bzhin zas //
NK037(ji)003:197: thang skyes chu skyes la sogs longs spyod rkyen //
NK037(ji)003:198: 'chi med bdud rtsi la sogs dam tshig chu //
NK037(ji)003:199: gu gul tshil chen la sogs bdug pa'i sprin //
NK037(ji)003:200: zhun chen mar me la sogs snang gsal mchog /
NK037(ji)003:201: bshos gtsang bza' btung longs spyod sna tshogs pa'i //
NK037(ji)003:202: rim gsum mchod pas tshogs bdag mnyes gyur cig /
NK037(ji)003:203: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la ga na pa ti sa pa ri w+aa ra push+pe /
NK037(ji)003:208: shap+ta p+au dza hoh badz+ra r+au pa shap+ta gan+d+he r+aa sa spar+she p+au dzahh+aum /
NK037(ji)003:210: khyad par gyi mchod pa smad phud rak+ta gtor ma
NK037(ji)003:211: gsum 'bul tshig cho ga rigs mthun gzhan nas blangs
NK037(ji)003:212: pa'i mthar mtshan sngags la so so'i sngags btags nas
NK037(ji)003:213: 'bul / bye brag tu gtor ma la rak+ta bran nas /
NK037(ji)003:214: rang gi thugs ka nas tsha zhing rtsub pa'i 'od
NK037(ji)003:215: zer 'phros pas mgon po 'khor bcas kyi rgyud bskul
NK037(ji)003:216: / sprul pa'i pho nya rnams kyis zhing bcur gyur
NK037(ji)003:217: pa'i dgra bgegs thams cad gtor ma la bstim par
NK037(ji)003:219: nang mchod bran la +aahh+aum gis sha khrag bdud rtsir spel la /
NK037(ji)003:221: rnal 'byor kun gyi dpal mgon mchog /
NK037(ji)003:222: ma h+aa k+aa la mthu rtsal can //
NK037(ji)003:223: dka' thub nag po tshur gson cig /
NK037(ji)003:224: legs ldan nag po ma rungs pa //
NK037(ji)003:225: sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa bzhes //
NK037(ji)003:226: rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te //
NK037(ji)003:227: gzhan gyi sde rnams pham mdzad pa //
NK037(ji)003:228: khram la btab pa'i dgra bgegs rnams //
NK037(ji)003:229: rol cig dgongs shig dam tshig gtso //
NK037(ji)003:230: khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab //
NK037(ji)003:233: ma h+aa m+aam sa kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)003:235: ma h+aa go ro tsa na kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)003:236: ma h+aa ba su ta kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)003:238: ma h+aa a mri ta kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)003:239: i dam d+h+au pe push+pe gan+d+he nee wi d+ya ba ling+ta pi pa to hoh zhes mchod /
NK037(ji)003:242: lha min dmag tshogs g.yul bzlog cing //
NK037(ji)003:243: lha dmag dkar po'i dbugs 'byin pa'i //
NK037(ji)003:244: legs ldan nag po 'khor bcas la //
NK037(ji)003:245: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK037(ji)003:246: bsod nams gzi brjid 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)003:247: ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs la spyod pa rlabs chen
NK037(ji)003:248: 'phags la drag shul mthu chen ldan la pha rol
NK037(ji)003:249: phyin bcu mnga' la sgrib pa rnam gnyis dag la
NK037(ji)003:250: bdag med gnyis rtogs khyod la ston pa'i lung bstan
NK037(ji)003:252: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang dgongs pa gcig /
NK037(ji)003:253: rig 'dzin grub thob rnams dang byin rlabs gcig /
NK037(ji)003:254: ma mo mkha' 'gro rnams dang dam tshig gcig /
NK037(ji)003:255: lha srin sde brgyad rnams dang mthu rtsal gcig /
NK037(ji)003:256: sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang smon lam gcig /
NK037(ji)003:257: tshogs bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)003:258: mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)003:259: zhes pa tsam gyis bstod de zor yang ba'i dbang du byas la /
NK037(ji)003:260: shes na bstod pa rgyas pa gzhan du 'byung ba bzhin bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:261: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni /
NK037(ji)003:262: mgon po'i thugs kar h+aum mthing nag gi mthar bzla
NK037(ji)003:263: bya'i sngags kyi phreng bas g.yas su bskor bar gyur
NK037(ji)003:264: / bdag gi thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros
NK037(ji)003:265: mgon po'i thugs ka'i h+aum yig bskul bas dbang du
NK037(ji)003:266: bsdus ci bgyi'i bka' nod cing phrin las thogs med
NK037(ji)003:268: b+hurkura ma h+aa pad+ma d+he burtsi bur byi ge byi
NK037(ji)003:269: ma na se e ho sho mo kro d+ha h+aum
NK037(ji)003:272: b+hu ru kurma a prar+na bud tsi ke bi ma
NK037(ji)003:273: na se kha sho mo ba kro d+ha h+aum h+aum
NK037(ji)003:276: b+hu ru ku ru i tsi ki byi u tsush+ma kro d+ha h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)003:279: ces sgrub chen gyi sngags so //
NK037(ji)003:280: mgon po'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'khor rnams las la bskul bar bsam nas /
NK037(ji)003:281: badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la sa ma ya h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:282: badz+ra yak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:283: badz+ra rak+sha dz+wa la sa ma ya h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:284: badz+ra tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)003:286: de ltar ci 'grub bzlas pa'i mthar nyer spyod lnga dang nang mchod phul la /
NK037(ji)003:288: drag po sku lnga rgyal ba'i bka' sdod mchog /
NK037(ji)003:289: ye shes lnga ldan rgyal ba rigs lnga'i 'khor //
NK037(ji)003:290: phrin las bdud 'dul dgra bgegs kun gyi gshed //
NK037(ji)003:291: legs ldan 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK037(ji)003:292: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)003:293: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas dgyes par mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:294: dam tshig 'gal 'khrul nyams chag mthol zhing bshags //
NK037(ji)003:295: thun mong mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)003:296: zhes bstod cing phrin las gsol /
NK037(ji)003:297: 'dir tshogs mchod byed na yi dam gang la brten pa de'i gzhung bzhin dang /
NK037(ji)003:298: yang na tshogs rdzogs bdud rtsi ltar byin gyis brlabs /
NK037(ji)003:299: bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa 'di //
NK037(ji)003:301: bar pa bskang bshags dang 'brel bas skong rdzas byin gyis brlabs la /
NK037(ji)003:303: bdag ni rig 'dzin sgrub pa po //
NK037(ji)003:304: dam la gnas shing lha la 'phreng //
NK037(ji)003:305: khyod ni srung ma mthu rtsal can //
NK037(ji)003:306: sngon tshe dpal chen spyan snga ru //
NK037(ji)003:307: bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa'i //
NK037(ji)003:308: khyod kyi dam bca' gnyan po de //
NK037(ji)003:309: da lta rnal 'byor bdag bskul na //
NK037(ji)003:310: thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)003:311: ma h+aa k+aa la gnas 'dir byon //
NK037(ji)003:312: legs ldan nag po dur khrod sgrol ging rdo rje
NK037(ji)003:313: sgrol byed sa bcu'i dbang phyug rig 'dzin srung ma
NK037(ji)003:314: rnal 'byor dgra lha tshogs bdag chen po gnas 'dir
NK037(ji)003:315: byon // bos so chos skyong snyan ma sra //
NK037(ji)003:316: g.yab bo legs ldan spyan ma rtul //
NK037(ji)003:317: sgrub bo tshogs bdag gong ma g.yel //
NK037(ji)003:318: bskul lo bdud rgyal mthu ma chung //
NK037(ji)003:319: do nub khyod kyi thugs dam bskang //
NK037(ji)003:320: bskang ngo bskal pas thugs dam bskang //
NK037(ji)003:322: me tog spos dang mar me dri //
NK037(ji)003:323: zhal zas rol mo'i bye brag dang //
NK037(ji)003:324: 'phan gdugs lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis //
NK037(ji)003:325: legs ldan 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang //
NK037(ji)003:326: sha chen lnga ni ri ltar spungs //
NK037(ji)003:327: bdud rtsi lnga ni mtsho ltar bskyil //
NK037(ji)003:328: ye shes lnga ldan dam rdzas 'dis //
NK037(ji)003:329: dpal mgon 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang //
NK037(ji)003:330: sha chen khrag dang dbang po lnga //
NK037(ji)003:331: tshil chen zhun mar mkhris pa dang //
NK037(ji)003:332: g.yang gzhi lhab lhub rkang gling sgras //
NK037(ji)003:333: dpa' mgon dmar chen bza' baca'i gtor ma dang //
NK037(ji)003:334: 'bru bcud bdud rtsi btung ba'i rgyun //
NK037(ji)003:335: khyad par dam rdzas sna tshogs kyis //
NK037(ji)003:336: dpa' mgon gling bzhi gling phran ri rab dang //
NK037(ji)003:337: rin chen bdud dang bkra shis rdzas //
NK037(ji)003:339: dpal mgon g.yag nag rta nag khyi nag dang //
NK037(ji)003:340: lug nag bya nag la sogs pa //
NK037(ji)003:341: rten pa'i dam rdzas sna tshogs kyis //
NK037(ji)003:342: dpa' mgon 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang //
NK037(ji)003:344: bskang ngo bshags so thugs dam can //
NK037(ji)003:345: dam can thugs dam bskang gyur nas //
NK037(ji)003:346: bdag gi nyams chag byang bar mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:347: dngos grub sgrub la bar gcod pa'i //
NK037(ji)003:348: 'gal rkyen bar chad zhi ba dang //
NK037(ji)003:349: mthun rkyen bsam pa thams cad sgrubs //
NK037(ji)003:350: rtag tu thugs dam ma g.yel bar //
NK037(ji)003:351: bcol ba'i phrin las sgrub par mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:354: hoh yon tan lhun rdzogs dngos grub stsol mdzad pa'i //
NK037(ji)003:355: rtsa brgyud bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor lha //
NK037(ji)003:356: dpal chen rdo rje srin po khro bo'i rgyal //
NK037(ji)003:357: legs ldan nag po 'khor bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)003:358: theg chen gsang sngags bla med sgor zhugs nas //
NK037(ji)003:359: spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig rnams //
NK037(ji)003:360: rtag tu bsrung zhing sdom par khas blangs nas //
NK037(ji)003:361: nyams chag 'gal 'khrul nongs pa mthol lo bshags //
NK037(ji)003:362: thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor sgom par khas blangs nas //
NK037(ji)003:363: tha mal las la yengs pa bde gshegs thugs rgyud
NK037(ji)003:364: bskul bar khas tha mal long gtam smras pa dmigs
NK037(ji)003:365: med ye shes sgom par dug gsum rtog pa'i dbang
NK037(ji)003:366: gyur phyi nang gsang rten 'dzugs par dgos pa'i dam
NK037(ji)003:367: rdzas ma tshang rtag tu mchod bstod bsnyen par snyoms
NK037(ji)003:368: las le los yengs pa man ngag sbas nas sgrub
NK037(ji)003:369: par gsang ba'i gnyer kha 'chol ba dam rdzas phud
NK037(ji)003:370: kyis mchod par khas blangs nas //
NK037(ji)003:371: 'bags btsog nyams par gyur pa rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin
NK037(ji)003:372: sgrub par gzu lum ras chod bgyis pa zol med
NK037(ji)003:373: dam tshig bsrung bar nyams grib skyon gyis phog pa
NK037(ji)003:374: sku gsung thugs dang rtsa ba yan lag gi //
NK037(ji)003:375: dam tshig 'gal ba ma lus so sor bshags //
NK037(ji)003:376: mthol bshags 'bul lo tshangs par mdzad nas kyang //
NK037(ji)003:377: dngos grub mchog gis bdag rgyud gtams par mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:378: ces dang yig brgya mang du bazla'o //
NK037(ji)003:380: skabs kyi phrin las la mkho ba'i dbang du byas kyi /
NK037(ji)003:381: rgyun gyi phrin las la ni bzlas pa'i rjes kyi
NK037(ji)003:382: bstod pa dang phrin las gsol ba'i mthar thun gtor
NK037(ji)003:384: bdud rtsir sbar bas mchod cing /
NK037(ji)003:386: lha yi sde dpon tshogs kyi bdag /
NK037(ji)003:387: legs ldan nag po mthu bo che //
NK037(ji)003:388: nye gnas kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma //
NK037(ji)003:389: ging dang gnod sbyin srin po dang //
NK037(ji)003:390: ma mo mkha' 'gro pho nya dang //
NK037(ji)003:391: sprul pa yang sprul 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)003:392: zag med 'dod yon bdud rtsi yi //
NK037(ji)003:393: dam rdzas mchod gtor 'di bzhes la //
NK037(ji)003:394: deng 'dir bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:395: sngar bcol las kyi gtang rag mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:396: phyi bcol las kyi gsos su bzhes //
NK037(ji)003:397: sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs //
NK037(ji)003:398: dkon mchog dbu 'phangs khyod kyis bstod //
NK037(ji)003:399: slob dpon sku dgra khyod kyis thul //
NK037(ji)003:400: sgrub pa po yi stong grogs mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:401: ces gtor ma sgrub khang gi yang thog la sogs par 'bul lo //
NK037(ji)003:402: slar yang gtang rag gi mchod bstod dang /
NK037(ji)003:404: rten yod na brtan bzhugs dang /
NK037(ji)003:405: med na gtor mgron ye shes pa gshegs /
NK037(ji)003:406: dam tshig pa rang nyid la bstim /
NK037(ji)003:407: gnas gsum du yi ge gsum gyis rgyas gdab /
NK037(ji)003:408: dge ba bsngo zhing shis pa brjod pas mtha' brgyan no //
NK037(ji)003:409: gsum pa rjes gnang gi cho ga ni /
NK037(ji)003:410: bdag mdun gyi sgrub mchod bzlas pa'i rjes kyi phrin gsol yan chad sngar bzhin byas nas /
NK037(ji)003:411: bum pa la gzungs thag gtad de /
NK037(ji)003:412: gtso sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang 'khor sngags rnams bdun re tsam dang /
NK037(ji)003:413: 'bru gsum nyer gcig re tsam bzlas pas byin gyis brlabs /
NK037(ji)003:414: rig pa'i me tog dor ba dang gnang ba nod pa rnams sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)003:415: slob ma'i bya ba khrus dang phyag byas nas gral la 'khod pa la /
NK037(ji)003:416: bgegs skrod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)003:418: sems can thams cad kyi don du sku bzhi'i bdag
NK037(ji)003:419: nyid dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang tshe 'di nyid
NK037(ji)003:421: de ma thob kyi bar du yang lam gyi 'gal rkyen bar chad bsal ba dang /
NK037(ji)003:422: mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i
NK037(ji)003:423: ched du dpal mgon legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po'i
NK037(ji)003:424: rjes su gnang ba zab mo gsan snyam pa'i byang
NK037(ji)003:425: chub tu sems bskyed pa gsal btab nas gsan par
NK037(ji)003:426: zhu / de yang 'o skol rnams kyis rnyed par
NK037(ji)003:427: dka' zhing don chen po dang ldan pa'i mi lus
NK037(ji)003:428: rnam par dag pa thob pa'i skabs 'dir dam pa'i
NK037(ji)003:429: chos yang dag pa zhig sgrub dgos te /
NK037(ji)003:431: mi yi gru la brten nas ni //
NK037(ji)003:432: sdug bsngal chu bo che las sgrol //
NK037(ji)003:433: gru 'di phyi nas rnyed dka' bas //
NK037(ji)003:434: rmongs ba dus su gnyid ma log /
NK037(ji)003:436: de lta bu'i rten de yang spyir 'jigs par sla
NK037(ji)003:437: zhing khyad par chos bzhin spyod pa rnams la bar
NK037(ji)003:438: chad kyi rkyen shin tu mang ba yin te /
NK037(ji)003:440: rin chen chos kyang dkon la rtag tu 'tshe ba mang //
NK037(ji)003:441: zhes gsungs pas bar chad kyi rkyen de las skyob
NK037(ji)003:442: par nus pa'i srung mthu dang ldan pa zhig la
NK037(ji)003:444: srung ma de la yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis las /
NK037(ji)003:445: dang po ni rang nyid kyang 'khor ba las ma thar bas gzhan skyob mi nus pa ma zad /
NK037(ji)003:446: gnas skabs phan pa chung ngu tsam 'grub tu srid
NK037(ji)003:447: kyang mthar log pa'i lam la sbyor ba dang 'khu
NK037(ji)003:448: ldog phra mo tsam la yang lus srog la bar
NK037(ji)003:449: du gcod pa sogs nyes dmigs che zhing phan yon
NK037(ji)003:450: chung bas / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srung ma khyad par can zhig brten dgos /
NK037(ji)003:451: de la'ang rgyud sde rin po che rnams nas rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig gsungs pa las /
NK037(ji)003:452: 'dir ni ngo bo bcom ldan 'das kun bzang chen mchog he ru ka nyid /
NK037(ji)003:453: gdul bya gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i ched du
NK037(ji)003:454: dpal ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po
NK037(ji)003:455: chen po'i skur bzhengs pa ste /
NK037(ji)003:456: a nu yo ga'i spyi mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo dang /
NK037(ji)003:457: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba bshad pa'i rgyud thal ba dang /
NK037(ji)003:458: bye brag gi sgos rgyud mtshon cha mngon par rol pa'i rgyud rnams kyi bstan cing /
NK037(ji)003:459: rgyal po lung bstan rdo rje dang ku ku r+aa
NK037(ji)003:460: dza sogs rig 'dzin grub pa thob pa rnams las
NK037(ji)003:461: brgyud de / sa bzhi pa'i dbang phyug gnubs chen
NK037(ji)003:462: po dang zur pa yab sras la sogs pa'i bla
NK037(ji)003:463: ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' srol las dbang dang
NK037(ji)003:464: rjes gnang gi bka' ji snyed cig mchis pa las
NK037(ji)003:466: de la yang thun mong ba dang thun mong ma
NK037(ji)003:467: yin pa gnyis yod pa las 'dir phyi ma ltar
NK037(ji)003:468: sgrub pa la / slob dpon gyi bya ba dang slob ma'i bya ba'i rim pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:470: bdag gi rnal 'byor dang mdun bskyed sgrub mchod la sogs pa rnams sngon du grub /
NK037(ji)003:471: gnyis pa la sngon 'gro dang dngos gzhi gnyis las /
NK037(ji)003:472: dang po ni slob dpon dpal he ru ka dang
NK037(ji)003:473: gnyis su med pa'i drung du rjes su gnang ba
NK037(ji)003:474: zhu ba'i yon du man+dala 'bul bar zhu /
NK037(ji)003:476: tsak+shu b+han+d+ha w+aa ra ma n+aa ya h'u gis mig dar dang /
NK037(ji)003:477: +aa kham b+ai ra h'u gis me tog gtad /
NK037(ji)003:478: gsol ba 'debs pa 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
NK037(ji)003:479: hoh dpa' mgon nag po ye shes sku //
NK037(ji)003:480: lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK037(ji)003:482: dpa' bos thugs rjes bzung bar 'tshal //
NK037(ji)003:484: legs ldan nag po'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK037(ji)003:486: las dang bsam pa kun 'grub cing //
NK037(ji)003:488: gnas skabs bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)003:490: zhes slob dpon gyis dris pa'i lan du /
NK037(ji)003:491: chos kun rang bzhin dag pas na //
NK037(ji)003:492: bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag /
NK037(ji)003:493: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
NK037(ji)003:494: thugs dam dbyings mchog bdag nyid ni //
NK037(ji)003:495: sems can 'byams klas ma lus kun //
NK037(ji)003:496: mchog nyid bsgrub phyir sbyor bas na //
NK037(ji)003:497: rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pa'i //
NK037(ji)003:498: sku yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig /
NK037(ji)003:501: ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog /
NK037(ji)003:502: gzi brjid phung po bla na med //
NK037(ji)003:503: sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa //
NK037(ji)003:504: rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)003:505: zhes bla ma yi dam dbyer med la phyag bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:507: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK037(ji)003:509: bcom ldan mchog ni bdag lags kyi //
NK037(ji)003:510: mchog nyid bsgrub phyir blang bar bgyi //
NK037(ji)003:511: rdo rje rgyal por khyod bzhugs pas //
NK037(ji)003:512: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
NK037(ji)003:513: rdo rje dam tshig mchog nyid kyis //
NK037(ji)003:514: phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bgyi //
NK037(ji)003:515: zhes lan gsum gyis sdom pa bzung //
NK037(ji)003:516: slob dpon gyi snying ga nas khro bo spros pas bgegs bskrad par mos shing /
NK037(ji)003:518: h+aum h+aum h+aum bi shwa badz+ra sogs bzla /
NK037(ji)003:519: slar yang snying ga nas ram yam kham spros //
NK037(ji)003:520: ye shes kyi me rlung chur gyur pas slob bu'i
NK037(ji)003:521: sdig sgrib thams cad bsregs gtor bkrus par bsam zhing
NK037(ji)003:528: sa ma ya hoh sa ma s+t+wam i dam na ra kan /
NK037(ji)003:529: zhes mna' chu blud nas dam la bzhag /
NK037(ji)003:530: ye shes pa dbab pa ni /
NK037(ji)003:531: pad nyi ro'i gdan la slob ma h+aum las byung
NK037(ji)003:532: ba'i he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo
NK037(ji)003:533: rje dang dung khrag 'dzin par bskyed /
NK037(ji)003:534: thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis ye shes pa dpag tu
NK037(ji)003:535: med pa spyan drangs pa slob ma la bstim nas
NK037(ji)003:537: h+aum h+aum gu h+ya badz+ra tsit+ta h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:538: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:541: a be sha ya a +aah zhes pas lha dbab /
NK037(ji)003:542: k+aa ya w+aa ka badz+ra tsit+ta tish+tha badz+ra /
NK037(ji)003:544: sngon tshe gong nas 'brel ba'i lha //
NK037(ji)003:545: bdag gi nyer gnas gang lags pa //
NK037(ji)003:546: las 'phro dang ni thugs rje'i lhar //
NK037(ji)003:547: da lta nyid du 'bab par shog /
NK037(ji)003:548: pra t+aits+tsha hoh zhes me tog 'bul /
NK037(ji)003:549: tsak+shu pra be sha ya phata /
NK037(ji)003:551: mdun gyi nam mkhar khrag zhag 'khrugs pa'i klong /
NK037(ji)003:554: zhes pa'i bar mngon rtogs ltar sa bon bskyed tshig
NK037(ji)003:555: rnams dor bas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs tshul dang
NK037(ji)003:556: mthun par lha ngo bstan nas /
NK037(ji)003:557: ni ye shes lhun gyis grub /
NK037(ji)003:558: m+aum nyid ji bzhin ye sangs rgyas //
NK037(ji)003:559: h+aum ni rtsa ba byang chub sems //
NK037(ji)003:560: ha zhes mthong ba yongs su dag /
NK037(ji)003:561: dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbyer med pas //
NK037(ji)003:562: ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par mthong //
NK037(ji)003:563: zhes pas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i
NK037(ji)003:564: sras bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin legs ldan tshogs
NK037(ji)003:565: kyi bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba mngon sum
NK037(ji)003:566: du mthong bar gyur snyam pa mdzod //
NK037(ji)003:567: dngos gzhi'i don du man+dala phul /
NK037(ji)003:568: dbyings kyi ye shes gtso mchog nyid //
NK037(ji)003:569: rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa //
NK037(ji)003:570: khyod ni dam tshig gtso lags kyi //
NK037(ji)003:571: dbang phyug rgyal por dbang bskur cig /
NK037(ji)003:573: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros /
NK037(ji)003:574: slob ma la thim pas 'od zer mthing ga'i phung por gyur /
NK037(ji)003:575: de las dur khrod rol pa'i gzhal yas khang chen
NK037(ji)003:576: po'i lte bar pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du h+aum
NK037(ji)003:577: las gri gug h+aum gis mtshan pa yongs su gyur
NK037(ji)003:578: pa las / dpal ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po zhes pa nas /
NK037(ji)003:579: zil gyis gnon pa'i bdag nyid can du bzhugs pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:580: zhes pa'i bar gyis mgon po'i skur gsal btab /
NK037(ji)003:582: ma la ya gnam lcags 'bar ba'i ri bo /
NK037(ji)003:583: dur khrod chen po brgyad sogs rang bzhin gyi gnas dang /
NK037(ji)003:584: mdun bskyed kyi sku las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs
NK037(ji)003:585: dpag tu med pa kha char bu yug 'tshubs pa
NK037(ji)003:586: bzhin du byon / slob ma'i lus la thim pas
NK037(ji)003:587: lus kyi sdig sgrib dag sku'i byin rlabs zhugs par
NK037(ji)003:588: bzhin du byon / bsam zhing / rtsa sngags kyi mthar /
NK037(ji)003:589: k+aa ya a be sha ya +aah zhes pa bzlas zhing rol mo'i sgra bya /
NK037(ji)003:590: de nas dbang gi lha rigs lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs spyan drangs /
NK037(ji)003:591: ar+g+ham nas shap+da'i bar gyis mchod /
NK037(ji)003:592: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shiny+tsa tu m+aam /
NK037(ji)003:594: de rnams kyis bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bsam la /
NK037(ji)003:596: mkha' dbyings rnam dag bum pa na //
NK037(ji)003:597: dpal ldan mgon po'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs //
NK037(ji)003:598: gnyis med byang chub sems rtogs chus //
NK037(ji)003:599: byin rlabs mthu yi dbang thob shog /
NK037(ji)003:600: b+hurkura ma h+aa k+aa la kro d+ha yak+sha rak+sha tsit+ta h+aum ha he phata b+h+yo a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:601: zhes dbang bskur zhing bum chu blud /
NK037(ji)003:602: des mgon po'i sku'i mthu stobs dang nus pa la dbang bar byas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:603: sku'i rjes gnang byin rlabs dang bcas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:604: slob dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas sngags kyi yig 'bru dpag tu med pa byon /
NK037(ji)003:605: slob ma'i snying ga'i sa bon la thim pas /
NK037(ji)003:606: ngag gi sdig sgrib dag gsung gi byin rlabs bzhugs par bsam zhing /
NK037(ji)003:607: sngags mthar w+aa ka a be sha ya +aah zhes btags pa bzla zhing rol mo'i sgra bya /
NK037(ji)003:608: slob dpon la gus 'dud byas pa'i rkyen gyis slob
NK037(ji)003:609: dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas sngags kyi
NK037(ji)003:610: phreng ba thon pa slob ma'i khar zhugs /
NK037(ji)003:611: snying ga'i sa bon gyi mthar g.yas bskor du 'khod par bsam la /
NK037(ji)003:612: snying po nye snying sgrub sngags rnams tshang ba'am /
NK037(ji)003:613: bsdu na sgrub sngags rkyang pa'i rjes zlos lan gsum byed du gzhug /
NK037(ji)003:614: bcom ldan bdag la stsal lags kyis //
NK037(ji)003:615: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
NK037(ji)003:617: bcom ldan 'di la sogs byin gyis brlab pa'i lung
NK037(ji)003:618: dang dam baca'i lung mi mdzad pa shas che yang
NK037(ji)003:621: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung
NK037(ji)003:622: ste ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi
NK037(ji)003:623: bar du / dpal ye shes kyi mgon po 'khor
NK037(ji)003:624: dang bcas pa lhag pa'i lhar bzung nas 'di'i snying
NK037(ji)003:625: po'i sngags ci nus re bzla bar dam 'cha' lags
NK037(ji)003:626: bar du / so // zhes rjes zlos lan gsum gyi dam bca' blang /
NK037(ji)003:627: nang mchod k+aa p+aa la'i bdud rtsis dbang bskur zhing /
NK037(ji)003:628: dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbyer med don //
NK037(ji)003:629: yab yum gnyis med bde ba'i bcud //
NK037(ji)003:630: byang chub sems kyi thig le 'dis //
NK037(ji)003:631: thabs kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro //
NK037(ji)003:632: badz+ra a mri ta a ti sarba ma tri tha /
NK037(ji)003:634: des mgon po'i gsung gi mthu stobs dang nus pa la dbang bar byas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:635: gsung gi rjes gnang byin rlabs dang bcas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:636: slob dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas phyag mtshan dpag tu med pa byon /
NK037(ji)003:637: slob ma'i snying gar thim pas /
NK037(ji)003:638: yid kyi sdig sgrib dag thugs kyi byin rlabs zhugs par bsam zhing /
NK037(ji)003:639: sngags mthar tsit+ta a be sha ya +aah zhes btags pa bzla zhing rol mo'i sgra bya /
NK037(ji)003:640: slob ma lhar gsal ba nyid yas mas nas rim pas 'od du zhu ste /
NK037(ji)003:641: snying ga'i h'u gi n+aa da'i bar du bsdus /
NK037(ji)003:642: n+aa da yang mi dmigs par mnyam par bzhag /
NK037(ji)003:643: slar yang h+aum zhes pa'i sgras slob ma mgon po'i skur skad cig gis gsal btab la /
NK037(ji)003:644: gri gus lag g.yas su byin te /
NK037(ji)003:646: sangs rgyas kun gyi ral gri che //
NK037(ji)003:648: dgra bgegs gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)003:649: de ring bu yis blang bar gyis /
NK037(ji)003:650: badz+ra karti ka a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:652: thod khrag lag g.yon du byin te /
NK037(ji)003:654: thod rlon gdug pa'i khrag gis gang //
NK037(ji)003:655: 'khor ba dong nas sprugs pa dang //
NK037(ji)003:656: dam nyams snying khrag 'thung ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)003:657: de ring bu yis blang bar gyis //
NK037(ji)003:658: ka p+aa la rak+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:660: mchan g.yas su tsan+da gyi bing byin te /
NK037(ji)003:663: srid gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang //
NK037(ji)003:664: gdug pa 'dul du brlag pa'i phyir //
NK037(ji)003:665: de ring bu yis blang bar gyis //
NK037(ji)003:666: rak+sha du bing a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:668: des mgon po'i thugs kyi mthu stobs dang nus pa la dbang bar byas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:669: thugs kyi rjes gnang byin rlabs dang bcas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:670: phrin las drag po'i rjes gnang ni /
NK037(ji)003:673: lcags sregs kyi brub khung gru gsum pa'i nang n+ri
NK037(ji)003:674: dang tri las dgra bgegs shin tu rid cing nyam
NK037(ji)003:675: thag pa'i rnam pa can du gyur /
NK037(ji)003:676: mgon po'i sprul pa'i dmag tshogs nam mkha' gang bar
NK037(ji)003:677: spros de rnams kyis drag po'i las mdzad par bsam
NK037(ji)003:678: la / bden stobs brjod de dmigs bya dgug gzhug bya /
NK037(ji)003:680: drag po gnam lcags phur bu 'dis //
NK037(ji)003:681: dbyings la ye shes shar ba dang //
NK037(ji)003:682: zhing bcu gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)003:683: de ring bu yis blang bar gyis //
NK037(ji)003:684: badz+ra k+ai la ya a b+hi shiny+tsa h+aum /
NK037(ji)003:686: rtsa sngags kyi sham bur sarba big+h+n+aana badz+ra k+ai la ya h+aum phata /
NK037(ji)003:687: ces brjod cing slob bus phur bu ling+gara btab nas bsgral /
NK037(ji)003:688: spro na mtshon cha gzhan rnams kyang gtad nas gdab
NK037(ji)003:689: pa sngar bzhin bya ste yig rnying las shes so
NK037(ji)003:690: // ling ro bdud rtsir sbar ba gcig thog mar
NK037(ji)003:691: mgon po la bsngosa nas lhag ma slob bu mgon
NK037(ji)003:693: gcig dang por slob mas zos lhag dkyil 'khor la bsngo /
NK037(ji)003:694: des mgon po'i phrin las kyi mthu stobs dang nus pa thams cad la dbang bar byas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:695: phrin las kyi rjes su gnang ba'o //
NK037(ji)003:696: mtha' brten gtor ma'i bka' bsgo ni //
NK037(ji)003:697: gtor ma dpal 'bar can slob ma'i mgo thog tu bzung la /
NK037(ji)003:698: de nyid mgon po 'khor bcas su gsal ba la mos gus dung ba byas pas /
NK037(ji)003:699: khyed rang rnams kyi spyi bor byon /
NK037(ji)003:700: slob dpon gyis bka' bsgos pa'i tshe /
NK037(ji)003:701: khyed rang rnams kyi nad gdon dgra bgegs thams cad tshar bcad /
NK037(ji)003:702: mthun rkyen phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub par zhal gyis bzhes par mos mdzod /
NK037(ji)003:703: ces brjod la rol mo'i sgra dang bcas te bstod
NK037(ji)003:704: pa ci rigs dang sngags tshar gcig brjod pa'i mthar
NK037(ji)003:705: / dpal ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis /
NK037(ji)003:706: rtsa ba dang brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dam
NK037(ji)003:707: pa rnams kyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar
NK037(ji)003:708: rigs kyi bu 'di'i srung ma mdzod la lus dang
NK037(ji)003:710: 'gal rkyen bar chad mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing /
NK037(ji)003:711: mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa'i bsam sbyor thams cad
NK037(ji)003:712: yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang rnam bzhi'i phrin las
NK037(ji)003:713: thams cad g.yel ba med par sgrub par mdzad du
NK037(ji)003:715: de las cung zad tshig sbyor rgyas pa sogs kyi bka' bsgo ci rigs byas pa'i mthar /
NK037(ji)003:716: gtor ma'i lha 'od du zhu nas slob ma la thim pa dpon slob gnyis kas sgom /
NK037(ji)003:718: de ltar rjes su gnang ba thob pa las /
NK037(ji)003:719: mgon po nyid rtag tu mi 'bral bar srung skyob mdzad pa chos nyid yin /
NK037(ji)003:720: khyod rnams kyis kyang dam tshig rnam par dag pa bsrung dgos te /
NK037(ji)003:721: spyir mchod gtor la brtson pa dang /
NK037(ji)003:724: nyi shu dgu la dus kyi gtor ma ma chad pa dang /
NK037(ji)003:725: snod du ma gyur pa la sku mi bstan /
NK037(ji)003:727: bya nag dang khyi nag la mi rdeg pa sogs /
NK037(ji)003:728: spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas par bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:731: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
NK037(ji)003:734: deng nas brtsams te sogs dang /
NK037(ji)003:735: dge ba sngo ba rnams bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:736: rjes gtang rag gi mchod pa sogs mjug gi bya ba rnams sgrub thabs bzhin bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:737: rjes gnang gtor dbang tsam byed par 'dod na /
NK037(ji)003:738: dus khyad par can la yo byad tshogs par byas nas /
NK037(ji)003:739: mgon po'i bris sku'i mdun du man+dala chos 'byung gru
NK037(ji)003:740: gsum gyi dbus su rten gtor bris sku dang dar
NK037(ji)003:741: nag gi ba dan btsugs pa bkod /
NK037(ji)003:742: de'i rgyab tu dpal chen po'i 'das gtor snga ma las stegs mi dma' bar bzhag /
NK037(ji)003:745: mchod pa rnams ci bder bsgrigs nas /
NK037(ji)003:746: sgrub mchod sngar bzhin byas la /
NK037(ji)003:747: rjes gnang dngos kyi bya ba ni /
NK037(ji)003:750: mtshams sbyor ci rigs sngon du 'gro bas man+dala phul /
NK037(ji)003:752: dpa' bo chen po dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)003:753: bdag cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)003:755: rgyal ba'i sras su bzung du gsol //
NK037(ji)003:757: rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir /
NK037(ji)003:758: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK037(ji)003:762: sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang /
NK037(ji)003:766: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas h+aum 'phros slob ma
NK037(ji)003:767: la thim pas ma dag pa'i lus sbyangs te dwangs
NK037(ji)003:769: de las he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dung khrag 'dzin pa'i skur bskyed /
NK037(ji)003:770: 'das gtor dpal chen yab yum du gsal ba spyi bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)003:772: rdo rje brag chen sra ba po //
NK037(ji)003:773: rdo rje chu ste sdud chen po //
NK037(ji)003:774: rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che //
NK037(ji)003:775: rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoh zhes bstod cing ru lu bzlas la /
NK037(ji)003:776: gtor ma'i lha la gus 'dud byas pas de'i sbyor
NK037(ji)003:777: mtshams nas byung ba'i byang sems spyi bo nas zhugs
NK037(ji)003:778: / smin mtshams yan chad gang bum dbang thob /
NK037(ji)003:779: mgrin pa yan chad gang gsang dbang thob /
NK037(ji)003:780: snying ga yan chad gang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob /
NK037(ji)003:781: lus thams cad gang dbang bzhi pa thob par mos su bcug /
NK037(ji)003:782: mthar gtor ma'i lha slob ma la thim pa'i rkyen gyis 'od mthing ga'i phung por gyur /
NK037(ji)003:783: de las dur khrod rol pa'i gzhal yas khang chen
NK037(ji)003:784: po'i lte bar pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du h+aum
NK037(ji)003:785: las gri gug h+aum gis mtshan pa las mgon por
NK037(ji)003:786: bskyed pa sgrub thabs bzhin bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:787: gnyis pa sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang ni /
NK037(ji)003:788: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK037(ji)003:789: ma la ya gnam lcags 'bar ba'i ri bo dur khrod brgyad sogs rang bzhin gyi gnas dang /
NK037(ji)003:790: mdun bskyed las mgon po'i sku dpag tu med pa
NK037(ji)003:791: spros te slob ma la bstim nas rol mo'i sgra
NK037(ji)003:792: bya / de bzhin du sngags kyi yig 'bru bstim pa dang /
NK037(ji)003:793: phyag mtshan dpag tu med pa bstim par bya /
NK037(ji)003:794: rol mo'i sgra byed pa'i gnas skabs gsum po la
NK037(ji)003:795: sngags drag tu bzla zhing sbyar ba'i spos bsreg pa
NK037(ji)003:796: rnams bya'o // gsum pa gtor ma'i bka' bsgo ni /
NK037(ji)003:797: gtor ma slob ma'i mgo bor bzung la /
NK037(ji)003:798: de nyid mgon por gsal btab nas slob dpon gyis bka' bsgo ba sngar bzhin bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:800: slob dpon dang mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas sngags kyi phreng ba thon pa slob ma'i khar zhugs /
NK037(ji)003:801: snying ga'i sa bon gyi mthar g.yas bskor du 'khor par bsam la /
NK037(ji)003:802: snying po nye snying sgrub sngags rnams tshang ba'am sgrub sngags kho na'i rjes zlos lan gsum bya /
NK037(ji)003:803: bcom ldan bdag la sogs kyis gsol ba btab /
NK037(ji)003:804: bcom ldan 'di la sogs kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i lung bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:807: yon dbul ba sogs rjes kyi bya ba sngar dang 'dra'o //
NK037(ji)003:808: yang gtor dbang kho na byed par 'dod na /
NK037(ji)003:809: gsol btab dang rgyun bshags song ba'i rjes la slob ma'i blo ngor /
NK037(ji)003:810: gtor ma mgon por bskyed cing spyan drangs /
NK037(ji)003:811: de nas gong bzhin gtor ma'i bka' bsgo nyid byas
NK037(ji)003:812: pas bar chad sel ba'i thabs mchog tu 'gyur zhing
NK037(ji)003:813: / mchod gtor 'bul ba sogs la dbang ba yin no //
NK037(ji)003:814: yang chos skyong du mi brten par bar chad sel ba tsam don du gnyeng ba la /
NK037(ji)003:815: bka' bsgo'i skabs srung ma mdzod la lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs te zhes pa bor /
NK037(ji)003:816: mgon po slob ma la bstim pa'i dmigs pa mi dgos /
NK037(ji)003:817: khyad par chos brgyud sel can dang chos sgor ma
NK037(ji)003:818: zhugs pa'i rigs la thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang
NK037(ji)003:820: gnas skabs su yul de la mi phan zhing /
NK037(ji)003:822: rnyed bkur la sogs pa'i don du gtor dbang byed
NK037(ji)003:823: na bshad ma thag pa la tshig gis spros te
NK037(ji)003:825: tshul 'di gzhan la'ang shes par bya'o //
NK037(ji)003:826: 'di'i dbang bka' rgyas pa sta gon dang 'brel ba
NK037(ji)003:827: dbang bzhi tshang ba sgrol dbang dang bcas pa zab
NK037(ji)003:828: cing phyag len dog por mdzad pa de ni /
NK037(ji)003:829: gtsang shod pa blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i
NK037(ji)003:830: dbang chog bde gsal don ldan zhes bya ba las
NK037(ji)003:831: shes par bya'o // 'dir ni dbang bka' 'bring po dang /
NK037(ji)003:833: shin tu bsdus pa ste brgyud pa'i khyad par gsum
NK037(ji)003:834: las 'ongs pa'i bka' srol rnams snying por dril ba
NK037(ji)003:835: yin no // rnam 'gyur dpag med srung ma'i gtso //
NK037(ji)003:836: legs ldan rdo rje nag po che //
NK037(ji)003:837: gang de'i sgrub thabs rgyud lung gi //
NK037(ji)003:838: snying po dbang dang bcas pa'o //
NK037(ji)003:839: ye shes kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po'i sgrub
NK037(ji)003:840: thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa'i le'u tshan gter chen
NK037(ji)003:841: 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo'i bum
